languages.text: Как бы вы ни старались, клинок не поддается. Время и непогода сплавили его рукоять с пикой.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
languages.original_text: Как бы вы ни старались, клинок не поддается. Время и непогода сплавили его рукоять с пикой.

traits.locale_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.
Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

languages.text: A pesar de tus esfuerzos, el arma no se mueve: el tiempo y los elementos han fundido su mango con la estaca.
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: A pesar de tus esfuerzos, el arma no se mueve: el tiempo y los elementos han fundido su mango con la estaca.

languages.text: 尽管你尽了一切努力，但利刃依然纹丝不动。由于长时间风吹日晒，刀柄和尖刺早已融为一体。
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: 尽管你尽了一切努力，但利刃依然纹丝不动。由于长时间风吹日晒，刀柄和尖刺早已融为一体。

languages.text: どうやっても、ブレードが少しも動かない―長い年月と風雨が柄を棘と融合させる。
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: どうやっても、ブレードが少しも動かない―長い年月と風雨が柄を棘と融合させる。

languages.text: Trotz all deiner Bemühungen gibt die Klinge nicht nach ... Zeit und die Elemente haben den Griff mit dem Spieß verschmelzen lassen.
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: Trotz all deiner Bemühungen gibt die Klinge nicht nach ... Zeit und die Elemente haben den Griff mit dem Spieß verschmelzen lassen.

languages.text: Vous avez beau faire, la lame ne bouge pas d'un pouce. À la longue, les ravages du temps et des éléments ont fini par en souder la poignée avec son support.
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez beau faire, la lame ne bouge pas d'un pouce. À la longue, les ravages du temps et des éléments ont fini par en souder la poignée avec son support.

languages.text: Tüm çabalarına rağmen pala yerinden oynamıyor. Zaman ve doğa şartları, sapını kazıkla kaynaştırmış.
languages.original_text: Despite all your efforts, the blade does not budge — time and the elements have fused the handle with the spike.

traits.locale_text: Tüm çabalarına rağmen pala yerinden oynamıyor. Zaman ve doğa şartları, sapını kazıkla kaynaştırmış.
